participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and imaginative, loves to explore and have fun with friends.
participant_1.background: i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i'm in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and caring, enjoys spending time with family and sharing stories.
participant_2.background: i am a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot.
